channel.title: Posts on Orange Hotpot's personal blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Orange Hotpot's personal blog

item.title: 3thPaymentCode
item.description: Scan to pay me without being friends! Wechat Alipay Statement：感谢小廖同志的100W捐款

item.title: 1st Personalblog
item.description: How to use hugo to write a blog Install Hugo chick here Create a New Site hugo new site quickstart Add a Theme Hugo Themes cd quickstart git init git submodule add https://github.com/budparr/gohugo-theme-ananke.git themes/ananke echo 'theme = "ananke"' >> config.toml Add Some Content hugo new posts/my-first-post.md Start the Hugo server [chick here]（http://localhost:1313/） hugo server -D Customize the Theme site Configuration code config.

item.title: 2th Personalblog
item.description: How to use hugo to write a blog test 看见这一行代表这是这二个 Install Hugo chick here Create a New Site hugo new site quickstart Add a Theme Hugo Themes cd quickstart git init git submodule add https://github.com/budparr/gohugo-theme-ananke.git themes/ananke echo 'theme = "ananke"' >> config.toml Add Some Content hugo new posts/my-first-post.md Start the Hugo server [chick here]（http://localhost:1313/） hugo server -D Customize the Theme site Configuration code config.
